parameters.query: =SELECT cf.id, cf.nom, cf.prenom, cf.email, cf.telephone, cf.raison_sociale, cf.tenant_id FROM client_finals cf WHERE cf.telephone LIKE '%' || RIGHT('{{ $json.from }}', 9) || '%' LIMIT 1

=INSERT INTO call_logs (
  tenant_id, caller_phone, direction, status, notes, 
  urgency_level, sentiment, action_taken, created_at, updated_at
) VALUES (
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT id FROM tenants LIMIT 1),
    '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000'
  ),
  '{{ $json.from }}',
  'entrant',
  'completed',
  'Appel entrant {{ $json.isAdmin ? "(ADMIN)" : "" }} - Q: {{ $json.speechResult.substring(0,200).replace(/'/g, "''") }} - R: {{ $json.aiReply.substring(0,200).replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  'STANDARD',
  'NEUTRE',
  'REPONDU',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
) RETURNING id
